Kate Wright has shown fans that her new husband Rio Ferdinand is a lucky man after flaunting her hourglass curves on Instagram .

The former TOWIE star, 27, looked sensational in the image that showed her modelling a tiny black bikini that featured elasticated detailing across the midriff.

The stunner's enviable assets took centre stage thanks to the scooping neckline of her two-pieces top.

Adding more glamour to her holiday look, the bombshell wore a large straw hat which she grasped onto the rim off and covered her eyes with sunglasses.

Preened to perfection for her day by the sea, the beauty had her golden locks styled in curls.

(Image: Instagram)

Clearly proud of her new name change, she captioned the snap: "Mrs Ferdinand."

The reality star married 40-year-old Rio last month in a stunning ceremony in Turkey.

After the wedding appeared in a glossy magazine spread the newleyweds have been posting unseen snaps from their big day.

(Image: Instagram)

One surprise that Rio pulled off was getting R&B sensation Ashanti to perform at their post-ceremony bash.

Kate is now stepmum to Tia as well as Rio's two sons Lorenz, 13, and Tate, 11.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

The star has legally changed her maiden name Wright to Ferdinand after the ceremony.

The newly-weds jetted straight back to the UK as Rio returned to work as a sports pundit.

They didn't slack on their exercise either as the couple hit the gym just four days after their nuptials.
description: The former TOWIE beauty gave fans treat by uploading a picture of herself from her time in Turkey
